mapper.select: select hm.message_id, hm.tenant_id, hm.message_type_code, hm.server_code, hm.subject, hm.object_version_number, hm.send_flag, hm.creation_date from hmsg_message hm join hmsg_message_transaction hmt on hm.message_id = hmt.message_id WHERE hm.message_type_code = 'EMAIL' and hmt.last_update_date >= #{startDate} and hmt.last_update_date <= #{endDate} order by hmt.last_update_date DESC

SELECT temp.transaction_id AS id, hmr.receiver_address AS email, temp.message_code as messageCode, temp.message_name as messageName, temp.trx_status_code as statusCode, temp.transaction_message as failedReason, temp.creation_date FROM hmsg_message_receiver hmr JOIN ( SELECT hmt.transaction_id as transaction_id, hm.message_id, hm.tenant_id, hm.message_type_code, hts.message_code, hts.message_name, hm.server_code, hmt.trx_status_code, hmt.transaction_message, hm.creation_date, hm. SUBJECT, hm.object_version_number, hmt.trx_status_code as statusCode FROM hmsg_message hm JOIN hmsg_message_transaction hmt ON hm.message_id = hmt.message_id AND hm.message_type_code = 'EMAIL' JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.server_code = hm.server_code AND htsl.template_code = hm.template_code JOIN hmsg_template_server hts ON hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id ) AS temp ON hmr.message_id = temp.message_id
and temp.statusCode = #{status}
and hmr.receiver_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{receiveEmail}),'%')
and (temp.message_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{templateType}),'%') or temp.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{templateType}),'%'))
and temp.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{failedReason}),'%')
AND ( temp.statusCode LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hmr.receiver_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR temp.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR temp.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{templateType}),'%') OR temp.message_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
order by temp.creation_date DESC

SELECT hm.message_id, hm.message_type_code, hm.server_code, hm.creation_date, hws.webhook_address as webhookAddress, hmt.trx_status_code AS statusCode, hmt.transaction_message AS failedReason, hm. SUBJECT AS messageName FROM hmsg_message hm JOIN hmsg_message_transaction hmt ON hm.message_id = hmt.message_id JOIN hmsg_webhook_server hws ON hws.server_code = hm.server_code WHERE hm.message_type_code = 'WEB_HOOK'
hmt.statusCode = #{status}
and hws.webhook_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{webhookAddress}),'%')
and hm. SUBJECT LIKE concat(concat('%',#{templateType}),'%')
and hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{failedReason}),'%')
AND ( hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hws.webhook_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hm. SUBJECT LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') OR hmt.transaction_message LIKE concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') )
ORDER BY hm.creation_date DESC
